pages.title: Locks
pages.text: Locks are used to lock treasure chests. All locks have a corresponding $(l:locks#keys)Key$() that is used to unlock it. However, certain locks can be unlocked by special keys and lock picks. You can view the lock's attributes by hovering over the item in your inventory. You can re-use locks to protect your own loot that is stored in treasure chests.

pages.title: Wood Lock
pages.text: $(l)Rarity:$() $(1)COMMON$()$(br)$(l)Category:$() $(6)ELEMENTAL$()$(br)$(l)Craftable:$() $(4)No$()$(br)$(l)Accepts Keys:$() $(2)Wood Key, Ember Key, Lightning Key, Skeleton Key, One Key$()
